import React from 'react'; import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function CartTotal({value}) { const {cartSubTotal, cartTax, cartTotal, clear} = value console.log(clear) return (
subtotal: $ {cartTotal}
Tax: $ {cartTax}
cartSubTotal: $ {cartSubTotal}
) } export default CartTotal;
